code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{sendOtp,verifyOtp}from'../services/authService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[phone,setPhone]=useState('');const[otp,setOtp]=useState('');const handleSendOtp=async()=>{await sendOtp(phone);alert('OTP sent to your phone');};const handleVerifyOtp=async()=>{const success=await verifyOtp(phone,otp);if(success){alert('OTP verified successfully');}else{alert('Invalid OTP');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Phone Number",value:phone,onChange:e=>setPhone(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSendOtp,children:"Send OTP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"OTP",value:otp,onChange:e=>setOtp(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleVerifyOtp,children:"Verify OTP"})]});};export default Login;
